name: Mini Racerz THE GAME
description:
Mini Racerz: THE GAME!

Art, music, and game by Matt "Meermatt" Capone (@miniracerz on Instagram)

Compatible with Playstation and Xbox controllers

CONTROLS:

Computer Keyboard- Left Shift is "Go", L/R arrow keys are "Steer"

Playstation- Square Button is "Go", Left Joystick is "Steer"

Xbox- X Button  is "Go", Left Joystick is "Steer"
